text: Pierluigi Chicca (22 December 1937 â€“ 18 June 2017) was an Italian fencer. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Olympics in the individual and team sabre events and won a team bronze medal in 1960 and team silver medals in 1964 and 1968. He was born in Livorno, Italy. Chicca died on 18 June 2017 in Rome, Italy, aged 79.E' morto a Roma l'olimpionico di scherma Pierluigi Chicca ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian fencers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Livorno
title: Pierluigi Chicca
